Articles.Content: If there are explanations for everything in the KSP universe in the developers minds, I hope they don't share them all with us, but enable us to find out through playing in the KSP universe. :-}
Actually this thread is a refreshing read for once. I'm also curious as to how colors appear the way they do.
My take on it was iodine in the soil and mercury in the oceans that gave Eve its coloration, though nobody really knows.

The chart is outdated and won't be this way, but sure.

http://i.imgur.com/08hdJyj.png

Remember, this is no longer the official chart, it changed and we don't have the new version yet.

Wow, when was this made exactly? It says under water "When we make life support" and under Nuclear Engines "Once tweakables come around..." so I guess it must be really old o.O

Don't question what you don't understand.

That's very anti-scientific.
And this is so old, while there's plenty of food for discussion regarding Eve's purple atmosphere it is best done in a new thread, so feel free to start one.
